text: Stephanie Bice (n√©e Asady, ; born November 11, 1973) is an American politician. She is the U.S. Representative for since 2021. She beat the incumbent Democrat Kendra Horn in the 2020 election. Bice is the first Iranian American to be elected to Congress. She has represented the 22nd district in the Oklahoma Senate since 2014. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:United States representatives from Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Oklahoma City
title: Stephanie Bice
